title: after some code comment receive: internal compiler error

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
hello, during playing with sample code and commenting part of it, i have receive such an error. just posting as asked in backtrace log. pavel ### Code ```Rust []https://github.com/srbpavel/rust/blob/main/black_hat/async_sha1_cracker/src/main.rs) ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.58.1 (db9d1b20b 2022-01-20) binary: rustc commit-hash: db9d1b20bba1968c1ec1fc49616d4742c1725b4b commit-date: 2022-01-20 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.58.1 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder/cstore_impl.rs:492:9 error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic ```
Backtrace

``` warning: unused import: `BufRead` --> src/main.rs:4:10 | 4 | io::{BufRead, | ^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(unused_imports)]` on by default thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder/cstore_impl.rs:492:9 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/db9d1b20bba1968c1ec1fc49616d4742c1725b4b/library/std/src/panicking.rs:498:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/db9d1b20bba1968c1ec1fc49616d4742c1725b4b/library/core/src/panicking.rs:107:14 2: core::panicking::panic_display at /rustc/db9d1b20bba1968c1ec1fc49616d4742c1725b4b/library/core/src/panicking.rs:63:5 3: core::option::expect_failed at /rustc/db9d1b20bba1968c1ec1fc49616d4742c1725b4b/library/core/src/option.rs:1637:5 4: ::stable_crate_id_to_crate_num 5: ::def_path_hash_to_def_id 6: as rustc_middle::dep_graph::dep_node::DepNodeExt>::extract_def_id 7: rustc_query_impl::query_callbacks::crate_hash::force_from_dep_node 8: ::try_force_from_dep_node 9: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 10: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 11: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::ensure_must_run:: 12: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 13: ::for_each_module:: 14: rustc_typeck::check_crate 15: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 16: >::with_task::> 17: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<(core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>, rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex), rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::execute_job>::{closure#3}> 18: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>> 19: ::analysis 20: ::enter::> 21: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 22: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 23: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.58.1 (db9d1b20b 2022-01-20) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack warning: `async_sha1_cracker` (bin "async_sha1_cracker") generated 1 warning error: could not compile `async_sha1_cracker`; 1 warning emitted ```
